channel.title: [GoudontV4/ReFlectionX V1] LOADS of content all skills [Noob friendly]
channel.description:
This has been on first page for more than 100 days straight | 10,000 views as of June. 28, 2013 | 6:43 PM. Now we are at 30,000+. Thank you mopar members! [img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/core/images/post/smiley.gif[/img].
This release is now officially successful, hope that you will all enjoy it.
[size=24pt]BEFORE Y'ALL POST HERE FOR ERRORS, READ THE README.txt [img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/core/images/post/smiley.gif[/img][/size] ________________________________ [Link ~ Source]: [size=14pt]MAKE SURE YOU COMPILE BOTH CLIENT AND SERVER BEFORE RUNNING[/size], AND READ THE FILE BEFORE RUNNING.
[b][size=12pt]DOWNLOAD THE SOURCE: [/size][/b][URL=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/68908723/Main%20server.rar][b][size=12pt]Source[/size][/b][/URL] [b][size=12pt]DOWNLOAD THE CLIENT:[/size][/b] [URL=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/68908723/Client.rar][b]New and improved patched client (100% fixed, noob friendly)[/b][/URL]
________________________________
Welcome to the ReFlectionX 562/Goudont V4 Release.
First of all, I would like to thank all the players for a great time, you guys are great. You don't have to read this, but this is just to show my appreciation, and how things have been. I've gotten to know a lot of people through out this server and I've taken time listening to people's suggestions and listening to what they have to say to make the server more enjoyable to everybody, and I'm really glad that the players cooperated in telling me money glitches, bugs, any dupes, or big glitches, and even if it was the smallest mistake, like a spelling mistake, they would still tell me, and even the smallest mistakes make the biggest changes. I would like to thank Greco Loco, for working with me on this server, and he is my inspiration, and a brother to me. This guy has been the most motivational person in my whole contacts, next to Abstract (w33d), Brenden (brenden), Camm (spectrum), Kate (shy), Zachary (disvirus), and the little cracker that I love, Shawn (lucifer). There was also Brandon (skrillaphat), who was the most loyal player and the most dedicated player. He was on everyday, and he was always trying to help out, no matter how small the problem was. There were also others, but these were the people who kept me going, and helped motivate me the most. I would like to thank moparscape, for a great experience, taking suggestions, helping me advertise to meet these players that I'm now very close with, and I'm just glad that I have met them. I would also like to thank Flavius, the Mezzyscape 562 owner, for everything he's done. Because of him, I've been interested in Rs2hd, and I've learned a lot from this experience, and it helped me get better java knowledge. And lastly, I would like to thank Kennelz the most, because of him, I know java it self. If he wasn't there, I wouldn't have learned java at all, and I wouldn't even know what a compiler was (LOL). Kennelz is a great guy, he's funny, and he's a great teacher. The work that he's done, inspired me to make a server like this one I've made, and I follow his footsteps. For those people who read this, thank you for reading. I know it doesn't really mean much to you, but I want everybody to know about these peo 1000 ple, and how they've made a change in this server.
This is the final release, as a retirement from rs2hd, and 562s. I'm going to not do 562s any more, as I would like to learn about more divisions, like 317 delta, 317 Project Insanity, 474, 667, 718... etc. For now, I'm going to work with Greco Loco on a 317 that's being hosted and worked on daily. For more information about that, all I will say, is the website to play is www.reflectionx.info
CREDITS OVERALL: Dragonkk 15% (for his starter as in the base it self, I personally think he deserves that straight up) MezzyScape 15% (for his base worked on, 5% for the revision update, 5% for his updates, 5% for motivation) K-Shawn[DevilsScape Lucifer] 15% (for some stuff, actually a lot, but yeah you get the point 3% for error fixes 8% for files and 'codes' and 4% for motivation) Grecoloco[Scapedef on mopar] 20% (I worked on the server with him 10% motivation, 10% 'codes', suggestions and fixes) Kennelz[United-PK] 10% (for his help. All 10% is reserved for his knowledge he gave me) Goudont[Me] 20% (For working on the server) Players[Players of the server] 5% (For motivation and suggestions)
Now for the features.
//////What's in V4/ReFlectionX?\\\\\\
~ Thieving random event fixed ~ Woodcutting random event fixed ~ Agility random event added
~ Holiday event (easter) ~ Each level up gives you +5 server points (server points cannot be spent, they're only for your player rank via ::myrank) ~ Max cape added ~ Completionist cape added ~ Skills go to 126 (now it says 126/126 instead of 126/99)
~ Summoning pet now stays with you if you log out (no more pets disappearing) + Now you can't pick up other people's pets
~ Rune essence mine, and teleport ~ Quick firemaking cube (click on it, and it takes all your logs and converts them to experience) + Different logs have different experience
~ New bows available from the vote shop (fastest bows in game) ~ New boss, 'Grecoloco' about 1,600 hit points, different types of attacks ~ Fixed some experience rates ~ Barrows fixed (no more glitched rewards, and you can access the chest after you kill all brothers) ~ Primal weapons (all) animations fixed, no longer punches ~ Chaotic Rapier animation fixed ~ x10 hits fixed
~ Slayer minigame ~ Beacon shop (actual shop now, click the chest beside the beacon to spend your points)
~ Made ::myrank command now give you a title depending on your rank ~ Made main dialogues not skip into other dialogues (except quests, I'm so freakin' lazy.) ~Time Counter, now instead of game seconds, it tells you how many hours, minutes, days.. etc. That you've played. ~ ::bank command for anyone above 1,200 total level (or any level if you're member)
~ Nice welcome screen ~ Play time, you play for a certain amount of time (10 hours) in total, you can buy a veteran cape by talking to "Skrillaphat" at home. ~ Max cape added ~ Completionist cape added ~ Yell titles change depending on your total level
~ ::afk command now works, you stay fully afk until you type ::back (admins have their chair change every 10 seconds XD)
~ 70% of membership shop items have been replaced ~ Vote shop has new items/replaced some ~ Dicing added ~ You can buy member points from the member shop (5 points for 50m, 50 points for 500m) ~ Members have exp boosts (depending on their rank, more explained in the [Membership] section)
~ Skillcape masters to give capes ~ Loadstone network
~ Made new tutorial island (prison break) ~ Hint arrows added ~ Tutorial island now has hint arrows that tell you where to go ^_^ ~ New food in game; 'Cheeze burger 100%' heals 70 (x10; 700) health.
~ New bone in game, 'Greco's bones' burry it for 100,000 prayer experience, only obtainable from 'Grecoloco' boss
~ Dungeoneering ring no longer allows you to teleport if you're tele blocked
~ Some admin commands fixed ~ Made greco drop torva at a low rate ~ Made greco drop clue scrolls ~ Players can't cheat wear 1000 the member items
////All features start here (40% of them are listed. YEAH. There's a lot.), (new features are also in here)\\\\
[Holiday/Events] + Easter Event npc dialogues finished + Easter Event with some npc interactions, such as catching the chocolate kebbit, and running around the server + Easter Event finished, 100% (but no longer in server, you can add it by simply adding the npcs and objects @ home or anywhere you want)
[Skilling Misc] + Each level up gives you +5 server points (server points cannot be spent, they're only for your player rank via ::myrank) + Max cape added + Completionist cape added + Skills go to 126 (now it says 126/126 instead of 126/99) -> If you want to put it back to 99, then go to source > com>rs2hd>model>Skills.java, and replace all 126 with 99, and 127 with 100) * Side note, there have been some edits with the 126 skills, like completionist cape requires 126 in all skills, and you need 110 fishing to fish lava eels +::yell titles change depending on your total level
[Misc Combat]
+ New bows available from the vote shop (fastest bows in game) for 12 points + New boss, 'Grecoloco' about 1,600 hit points, different types of attacks + Fixed some experience rates + Barrows fixed (no more glitched rewards, and you can access the chest after you kill all brothers) + Primal weapons (all) animations fixed, no longer punches + Chaotic Rapier animation fixed + x10 hits fixed
- Some drops are bugged (nex, corp. They seem to be broken.)
[Magic] + Magic requires the correct runes to use the spell or teleport + Magic requires the correct level to use the spell or teleport
[Misc] +Ring of stone added +you can't yell or talk unless you've finished tutorial island +Made ::myrank command now give you a title depending on your rank +Made main dialogues not skip into other dialogues (except quests, I'm so freakin' lazy.) +Time Counter, now instead of game seconds, it tells you how many hours, minutes, days.. etc. That you've played. +::bank command for anyone above 1,200 total level (or any level if you're member) +Bank pins +Nice welcome screen +Play time, you play for a certain amount of time (10 hours) in total, you can buy a veteran cape by talking to "Skrillaphat" at home. + Now it tells you days, hours, minutes and seconds instead of just seconds +Max cape added +Completionist cape added +Yell titles change depending on your total level +::afk command now works, you stay fully afk until you type ::back (admins have their chair change every 10 seconds XD) +70% of membership shop items have been replaced +Vote shop has new items/replaced some +Dicing added +You can buy member points from the member shop (5 points for 50m, 50 points for 500m) +Members have exp boosts (depending on their rank, more explained in the [Membership] section) + Quests (3 member, 2 non member) + Skillcapes + Loadstone network (lol), click the home or world map button in the mage book, and choose where you want to go + Made tutorial island lock picking easier. + Hint arrows added + Tutorial island now has hint arrows that tell you where to go ^.^ + New food in game; 'Cheeze burger 100%' heals 70 (x10; 700) health. + Tutorial island (prison break) + New bone in game, 'Greco's bones' burry it for 100,000 prayer experience, only obtainable from 'Grecoloco' boss + Skill cape masters all through out the server, (not actual rs spots, but some are) buy skillcapes from them by talking to them + Dungeoneering ring no longer allows you to teleport if you're tele blocked + Some admin commands fixed + Made greco drop torva at a low rate + Made greco drop clue scrolls + Players can't cheat wear the member items + Perfect ring fixed
[Agility] + Random event + Random event should be fixed, players cannot get glitched now
[Mining] + Rune essence mine made + Command to teleport to rune essence mine, (::essence)
[Summoning] + Summoning pet now stays with you if you log out (no more pets disappearing) + No 1000 w you can't pick up other people's pets
[Slayer] + Slayer minigame, Level 2 added + Slayer minigame, prestige experience boost fixed
[Crafting] + Spinning wheel added (it's actually a pottery oven, cause spinnin wheel was bugged, wouldn't work) (spawn object 4310 @ HOME or where ever you want it to be)
[Construction] + Convert planks to logs + Right prices ~ Teak and mahogany are replaced with Yew and Magic logs because those 2 trees would give me errors :L (crashes client) + Gives construction experience
[Firemaking] +Fire Address cube(LolNoobShit) Click the Address cube (fire) at home or ::wc It takes all your logs and converts them to firemaking experience. (Was going to do bonfires, but players are seriously that lazy, and said to only do one click experience.)
[Dungeoneering] + Once you enter the dungeoneering area, a ring will be added to your inventory for quick teleports. + 2 floors added (skillers only, you can choose if you want to go there) + Skillers dungeoneering started [3/23/2013] + Floor 1 completed [3/23/2013] + Floor 2 completed [3/23/2013] (ran out of ideas after, so there's only 2 floors :L)
[Herblore] + All potions work now
[Minigames] + (Beacon minigame, credits to UnitedPK 525(Kennelz's server) for the idea) + All logs work + Point shop made, instead of it automatically giving you + Click the beacon in edgeville to learn how the game works
+ (Slayer minigame) + 2 floors + Prestige Experience multiplier fixed + Removed the timer floor due to bugs
+ (Barrows) + Kill those crackers in purple for rewards. + Rewards fixed
+ (Garden minigame) + No more glitching the plant from outside the gate + Collect seeds and spend em on the fountain shop for great experience in farming + 4 areas, all working and depend on level to work + The higher the level, the better the seed
+ (Some other couple minigames, forgot them. But they're cool, no lies... seriously they're pretty cool :D.)
[Membership] + New items in shop + Some items in the member point shop added/changed + Member ranks; + Regular members get 2x/3x exp rate depending on the skill + access to member zone and member items + Super members get 3x/4x exp rate depending on the skill + above, and 5% drop rate increase + Premium members get 4x/5x exp rates depending on the skill + above, and 8% drop rate increase, + stronger items
[Karma - Good / Evil] +player karma rank now shows via ::players + rune crafting now gives good karma +more thieving npcs give bad karma +killing citizens gives bad karma +thieving from stalls gives bad karma depending on level
[Useful/Server files] +One file does main work (config.java, you can change home coords, you can change server name, welcome message, owner's name... etc) +New/cleaner/simpler npc save location file (credits to Shawn) +Givevp command, gives a certain amount of vote points (you choose how many, works as: givevp *amount* *name* +Givedp command, gives a certain amount of member points (same method as vote points) + "spawn *id*" spawns and saves an npc into the server files + Simple method in player.java which allows message to be send to all players -> player.sm for one person, player.SendMessage for all players -> player.SendMessage("message here"); [Will be sent to all players] -> 100% credits to shawn
... for ****'s sake, I added so much, can't even remember what else :L Players of my server, if I missed the stuff you really liked, please comment it below, or message me so I can add the information in.
~PICTURES~: [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img35/7762/welcomescreeng.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img200/2179/thebaws.bmp[/img]
SUMMONING PET STAYS ON LOGIN LEL [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img850/4241/summoningpetstays.png[/img] SUMMONING PET STAYS ON LOGIN
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img15/9746/questsrm.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img694/4114/slayermini.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img89/1899/myrank.png[/img] [IMG]http://http:/ 1000 /imageshack.us/a/img28/7084/membershop.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img202/8954/maxcapec.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img825/3813/glitchprevent.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img10/7914/fishingp.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img24/4527/firemakingskillcape.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img825/4240/firemakingh.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img823/3272/clue1cl.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img839/4453/barrowsq.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img163/3773/arrowo.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img705/5601/58175027.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img577/4849/65449243.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img651/9967/pic1x.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img16/2371/46038079.png[/img]

item.dc:creator: @goudont goudont
item.description:
@goudont wrote:

veraflows:

If your still around, I’m still getting the problem where I cant login on the same account twice. I’m using JDK 8.51. I saw some mention of needing new libs with a higher java version? how can I do this?

I’ve never attempted adding new libs in. I’ve always stuck with JDK/JRE 6. You can look around RSPS websites or post a question asking how to.

Sorry I’m not much help with it, bud. Good luck!

*Keep in mind that this server is for learning purposes. If you’re going to host it, make sure you’ve stabilized it a bit and it’s host-ready or meets your terms. Otherwise, host it if you’d like.

Have fun, and good luck!

(also, this is the older source, use the more updated version for better results)

Contemplating running it on an Ubuntu Server but my knowledge is limited in that area atm so for now I will stick with windows dedicated. Thanks again for all the work everyone put into this!

Edit: Having an issue with the client, seems to have a graphics flicker issue. Could you give me any tips to getting to the bottom of that issue?[/quote]

item.source: [GoudontV4/ReFlectionX V1] LOADS of content all skills [Noob friendly]

item.title: [GoudontV4/ReFlectionX V1] LOADS of content all skills [Noob friendly]
item.dc:creator: @headyGains headyGains
item.description:
@headyGains wrote:

Thank You Goudont for the awesome Source/Client, just starting out and you’ve made it incredibly simple. Contemplating running it on an Ubuntu Server but my knowledge is limited in that area atm so for now I will stick with windows dedicated. Thanks again for all the work everyone put into this!

Edit: Having an issue with the client, seems to have a graphics flicker issue. Could you give me any tips to getting to the bottom of that issue?

Read full topic
item.source: [GoudontV4/ReFlectionX V1] LOADS of content all skills [Noob friendly]

item.title: [GoudontV4/ReFlectionX V1] LOADS of content all skills [Noob friendly]
item.dc:creator: @goudont goudont
item.description:
@goudont wrote:

[quote=“scewbsdewbs, post:316, topic:518970”]This is great!! i loved the intro lmao!Sorry im so full of questions, this is my first time.

A)So I am not sure how to make my character owner or admin status (I have tried changing the xml file by editing(Not sure what im doing) I have also opened the xml file in word pad and changed the rights to 2 but everytime i log in it just goes back to 0.

B) Where could i find a list of appropriate owner commands for the server . [like adding money, modifying skills and vote points / donor, etc.]

C)Also i am still unclear about how others will connect to my server, i have done port forwarding, but would they need to download a client? or how would they connect?

D)did u use models or would that be class? (just wondering because i want to add custom items / npcs)[/quote]

Don’t worry, I’m glad you’re using this as a starter base, it’s easy to learn off of

A) For displaying your self as owner, change it in Settings.java and ActionSender.java. Replace “Goudont” with your owners name in quotations. For command-wise making your self owner, open up CommandPacketHandler.java and CommandsPacketHandler.java and replace “Goudont” with your owners name in the quotations. It helps if you look in the ReadMe.txt or whatever text file is there in the server within the run folder. It’ll help you out!

B) CommandPacketHandler.java - It has all admin+ commands. The ones with && player.main == 1 beside it means it’s main owner only commands. The ones that have a specific username beside it, such as && player.getDisplayName().equals(“Goudont”) those are the owner only commands, meaning the name in the bracket can only do them.

C) Make sure ClientSettings.java in the client folder has your ip set in it and the client is compiled so you can get other players to connect properly

D) Custom items isn’t included, but custom npcs is. Find the npcs in the file called “NpcDefinitionLoader.java” I think. I don’t quite remember. It should be NpcDefinition… .java anything that has npc definition in it, try looking in one of them. One of them has the whole list of custom npcs.

Hope I helped!

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @goudont goudont
item.description:
@goudont wrote:

[quote=“Bl3nd, post:313, topic:518970”]For A: Look 4 posts above and you’ll see that it doesn’t matter.
B: Need to portforward.
C: Yes it is, you just need look at videos/tutorials.[/quote]

Thanks for the back up man, appreciate it.

[quote=“scewbsdewbs, post:314, topic:518970”]Thank you so much for the response! I am still running into a problem tho, I have done port forwarding, but how would others connect? like do they need to download my a client?
also I keep getting error connecting to server… when ever I try to login or run the client. Maybe I am using the wrong ip address or not putting in a certain spot, would I use my IPv4 address, and it wont work with a local ip(127.0.0.1).[/quote]

Make sure the server is allowed access through your firewall, otherwise you won’t be able to connect even with localhost
